channel.title: RS is officially fucked up
channel.description:
"Real-world traders believe they are running legitimate businesses. In some cases, though, it's essentially organised crime."
LOL. They are now banning a whole bunch of stuff such as unequal trading. Read this its a hoot! http://www.runescape.com/kbase/view.ws?guid=diary06[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 10 December 2007, 10:09:03 PM[/size][hr]Their going nuts!
BRING BACK PKING! BRING BACK RUNESCAPE! ~RUNESCAPE~ BORN 1999 DIED 10TH DECEMBER 2007
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 10 December 2007, 10:10:11 PM[/size][hr]Wait a sec. What about account selling?

item.title: RS is officially fucked up
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:112, topic:163875”]Moderators never lie about such important issues. I have no way of knowing, but Ikiliki does? No. I’ve seen moderators (Both forum moderators and Jagex moderators) state that this is a fake rumour and it won’t happen. Jagex have even posted on their main website that the Wilderness will not be back unless their development team or the members come up with something.

So please, think before you post.[/quote]
I lol.
NO DUH

BTW GIMME YOUR WHIP

Read full topic

item.title: RS is officially fucked up
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Zach1188:

You weren’t there, and you have no way of knowing, thus you should not post on the matter. However, whether or not the mod was lying can be debated.

I don’t see what I’ve said back that’s worse.

Read full topic

So please, think before you post.
